backend/main.mo: Defines profile, like, match, and chat data types with comparison helpers and provides authenticated CRUD operations using access control and storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to source files, components, and test IDs for verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend source files for reference or tooling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_MAINNET.md: Mainnet deployment guide describing prerequisites and steps for building and deploying PlayPal.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables defining the app's light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with PWA meta tags, manifest link, iOS settings, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, theming, start URL, and icon assets.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing versioned cache management and network-first or cache-first strategies.
frontend/scripts/mainnet-redeploy.sh: Shell script automating clean install, build, checks, and mainnet deployment via dfx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app entry that handles identity initialization, user profile checks, startup performance markers, and routes between login, setup, or main app shell.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Core navigation container that switches between screens, manages chat and profile views, and lazily loads secondary screens.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessageBubbl: Displays a chat message bubble with styling based on sender and formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverCard.tsx: Shows a detailed profile card with avatar, bio, stats, and metadata for discovery browsing.
Renders level and zone filter controls for discovery search using select components.
frontend/src/components/InlineScreenFall: Simple inline loading fallback with a spinner and message.
frontend/src/components/InlineSheetError: Error boundary for sheet content that shows a retry/close UI instead of crashing the app.
frontend/src/components/LevelStars.tsx: Displays a 1–5 star rating based on player level.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoUplo: Handles image selection and upload with validation, progress tracking, and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/StartupShell.tsx: Lightweight skeleton UI shown during initial identity and app loading.
frontend/src/components/UserAvatar.tsx: Renders a user photo or a placeholder icon if none exists.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useMessageNotificatio: Implements polling, unread tracking, sender-name caching, and notifications for new chat messages tied to the authenticated user.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query for profiles, matches, chat messages, likes, and uploads, providing caching and mutation helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color tokens and global element styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/ChatScreen.tsx: Renders a chat interface with message list, profile header, sending capability, and auto-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/screens/DiscoverScreen.tsx: Displays a swipe-style discovery screen with filters, candidate navigation, and like/pass interactions.
frontend/src/screens/EditProfileScreen.t: Form-based screen allowing users to edit and submit profile fields, updating via a mutation hook before returning to the previous screen.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Login UI that triggers Internet Identity authentication with branding, tagline, and loading states.
frontend/src/screens/MatchesScreen.tsx: Fetches and lists user matches, showing loading and empty states and linking each match to chat or profile views.
Displays another user’s profile with loading, error, and empty states, allowing navigation back and refetching on error.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Shows the logged-in user's profile with stats, photo, and details, and allows switching to an edit mode.
Initial profile creation form collecting user details and submitting them via a create-profile mutation.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsScreen.tsx: Settings screen with account logout flow, confirmation dialog, and about section.
frontend/src/utils/discoverFilterMapping: Maps Level enum values to UI string keys and back for filter components.
frontend/src/utils/profileMappings.ts: Converts Level and Position enums to numbers or Spanish labels and back.
frontend/src/utils/startupPerf.ts: Dev‑only startup performance logger that records marks and reports timings.
frontend/src/utils/unreadMessagesStore.t: Loads, saves, and clears unread message state per user using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read, persist, and clear URL and session parameters, including hash parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing performance issues, existing features, and pending requests.
